title: For you
lyrics: Hangeoreumssik daga oneun neurin balgeoreum Du beon dasi oji anheul jigeum i sigan Se beon mane neoro gadeukchan nae du nuni Ni beonjjaeya meomchujima Baby our love so blue~ Daheul deut mal deut han ni songire chwihae Love so blue~ Deo gipi ppajyeodeureo Baby our love so blue~ Tteollineun sumgyeori to night Tonight~ Sumi meojeul geot gata I’m falling for you dagawa nal heundeureojwo Aetae uji malgo nae mam gajyeoga soljikhage malhaebwa I’m falling for you nae gwit gae soksagyeojwo Seodureuji malgo nae mam gajyeoga jomdeo gakkai naegero wa Deoneun mot chamgesseo nan Imi naege ppajyeos seo Deoneun mot chamgesseo nan Imi naege ppajyeos seo Ori mujung sangtae naneun eodie Jinsil hogeun geojit eopsneun du nun Morakmorak meori apa oh my jigeum nae gwisgae malhae oh my Morakmorak meori apa oh my jigeum nae gwisgae malhae oh my Baby our love so blue~ Daheul deut mal deut han ni songire chwihae Love so blue~ Deo gipi ppajyeodeureo Baby our love so blue~ Tteollineun sumgyeori to night Tonight~ Sumi meojeul geot gata I’m falling for you dagawa nal heundeureojwo Aetae uji malgo nae mam gajyeoga soljikhage malhaebwa I’m falling for you nae gwit gae soksagyeojwo Seodureuji malgo nae mam gajyeoga jomdeo gakkai naegero wa ...Josimseureopge nal anajwo Deo budeureopge nal saranghaejwo i bami dulmanui bami ...Josimseureopge nal anajwo Deo budeureopge nal saranghaejwo i bami dulmanui bami I’m falling for you dagawa nal heundeureojwo Aetae uji malgo nae mam gajyeoga soljikhage malhaebwa I’m falling for you nae gwit gae soksagyeojwo Seodureuji malgo nae mam gajyeoga jomdeo gakkai naegero wa Deoneun mot chamgesseo nan Imi naege ppajyeos seo Deoneun mot chamgesseo nan Imi naege ppajyeos seo
